item.title: About
item.description: Hey there: Welcome, I am Luis Vaca Vaca (squaredcow) owner and author of this blog. Once I read on LinkedIn: “If you cannot explain in five words what do you do for a living, you are probably lying”. That said, I am a programmer. Now, if I may give the verbose self-description: I am a programmer, graduated as Software Engineer, +8 years ago, focused on Web Services and Distributed Systems. I have been writing code for big-tech companies, start-ups, consultant firms and now, in this blog, for myself.
